prod_short_desc: Create brilliant Spinjitzu tricks with the Blue Ninja!
prod_long_desc:
Be ninja and show off your Spinjitzu tricks with Jay! Place the Blue Ninja in the capsule with his shurikens, attach to the spinner and pull the rip cord. Spin, roll, jump and learn super tricks like The Leapfrog. Then create your own Spinjitzu challenges and battle your friends to become the ultimate Spinjitzu master!
Includes a Jay minifigure.
Features a Spinjitzu spinner with buildable LEGO® brick handle, spinner element with minifigure capsule and rip cord, weapon rack with nunchucks, and Jay’s 2 shurikens.
Learn The Palm Spin, The Orbit, The Zen, The Leapfrog, The Drift, The Knockout and other cool Spinjitzu moves.
Create your own spin-tastic challenges and compete against your friends.
Go online for even more Spinjitzu tricks and inspiring videos.
Combine with other Spinjitzu Masters spinner sets—70628 Lloyd, 70633 Kai, 70634 Nya, 70636 Zane and 70637 Cole—for ninja vs. ninja skill showdowns.
This fun toy is suitable for ages 6-14.
Spinjitzu spinner (without rip cord) measures over 5” high, 3” wide and 1” long.
Weapon rack measures over 1” high, 1” wide and under 1” long.
